info.name: Simple Dark Google Plus
info.description: You know, I am not sure why I did not make a skin like this in the first place.  I guess I just like things pretty for my Google.  Still, I wanted to see if Google would make an option for this in it's own code.  Well, it hasn't happened and as part of a special request (Thanks Brett) I have made this one for those of you who want a simple Google experience without all the white background that hurts your eyes. This is for you.
info.additionalInfo:
1.1 Colorfixes
1.2 Support for Google Photos
1.3 Added support for Google Photos
1.4 Fixed domain change from talkgadget to hangouts.google.com; colorfixes
1.5 New G+ Changes

data.title: The choice of gold font color with soft edges makes text look fuzzy.
